descript.abstract:
The Park and Pool Lots layer contains an inventory of park and pool lots throughout the Twin Cities Metropolitan area and surrounding counties, including communities in the neighboring state of Wisconsin. These locations allow commuters the ability to park their private vehicles for extended periods of time and meet others for commuter pooling purposes.
The dataset was geocoded using TLG centerline streets. When specific site details were available, the geography was moved off street lines to actual facility locations using orthophotographic imagery as a base layer. All attempts were made to correctly reflect the real lot locations; however the positional accuracy of this data cannot be guaranteed.
This inventory is maintained as a geographic record of the parking lots locations, and can be utilized alongside the "Park-and-Ride Annual Survey" table for historic capacity and utilization figures of park and pool locations.
descript.purpose: To identify park and pool locations in the Twin Cities metropolitan area and surrounding counties, including communities in the neighboring state of Wisconsin.
descript.supplinf: Twin Cities Metropolitan Area - including Minnesota Counties: Anoka, Carver, Chisago, Dakota, Goodhue, Hennepin, Isanti, Le Sueur, Mille Lacs, Ramsey, Rice, Scott, Sherburne, Stearns, Washington, Wright; Wisconsin Counties: Dunn, St. Croix

timeperd.current: Park and pool locations are accurate as of the Time Period of Content date.

place.placekey: Twin Cities, Minnesota, Anoka County, Carver County, Chisago County, Dakota County, Goodhue County, Hennepin County, Isanti County, Le Sueur County, Mille Lacs County, Ramsey County, Rice County, Scott County, Sherburne County, Stearns County, Washington County, Wright County, Dunn County, St. Croix County

attracc.attraccr: Attributes are considered accurate. See the Entity and Attribute Overview for more details.

horizpa.horizpar: Orthophotos were used in referencing park and pool locations. Positional accuracy varies throughout the dataset.

dataqual.complete: All park and pools historically tracked for Metro Transit Annual Park and Ride Survey purposes are included in the dataset.

spdoinfo.mgmg3til: One file for entire metro area.

overview.eaover:
Park and Pool Lots Attributes
TCode: Unique value used by Metro Transit for identification of facilities
PnRNum: Identification number for park and pool used in the Annual Survey Table
Name: Name of the park and pool lot
Status: Current status of the facility Open = Facility is open for use Closed = Facility is permantly closed
Address: Parking lot address
City: City in which parking lot is located
Provider: State DOT that maintains park and pool lot
LocDetails: Lot location details (intersection, quadrant, portion of parking lot, etc.)
YearOpen: The year in which this lot opened for service
YearClose: The year in which this lot has closed down, if applicable
CurrentCpct: Number of parking spaces currently available at this lot
SharedUse: Indicates whether the lot is shared with another use Y = Yes, lot is shared with another use N = No, lot is standalone and not shared with another use
ShrUseDesc: Description of the shared or complementary use of the parking lot, if applicable
Notes: Any additional notes regarding this parking lot

If you transmit or provide the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user, it is recommended that the GIS Data include a copy of this disclaimer and this metadata.
